title.narrative: E-Society and Innovation for Competitiveness (EIC) Project

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to address constraints to competitive e-Society and enterprise innovation in Armenia by strengthening the underlying infrastructure and enabling environment.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Section 1. A. Institutional Arrangements | Description :The Borrower shall, within one month after the Projecteffectiveness, establish a Project Steering Committee, consisting of the representatives from all entities involved in the Projectimplementation, and maintain it until completion of the Project | Due Date :31-Jul-2011

Finance Agreement :Section 1. C. Subsidiary Finance Agreements | Description :the Borrower shall make a part of the proceeds of theLoan available to PFIs or EIF or the Seed and Early Stage VentureFund, respectively, under subsidiary agreements to be enteredinto between the Borrower and each PFI or the EIF or the Seed and Early Stage Venture Fund, respectively | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Section 2 B 4. Financial Management, Financial Reports and Audits | Description :One year after the firstdeposit into the Seed and Early Stage Venture Fund commercial account mentioned in Section IV.A.2 of this Schedule is made eitherby the Seed and Early Stage Venture Fund or the private investors, and every year thereafter, cause the Seedand Early Stage VentureFund to carry out an annual independent external audit | Due Date :30-June-2015

title.narrative: Residential broadband household penetration in the villages under the project scope
Number of projects financed through the Venture Fund
Number of manpower trained and certified under the project (number of people)
Number of sales and investments generated by the representative office (million USD)
Number of projects prepared and presented to potential investors
Number of enterprises benefited from GTC
Development of Knowledge and Technology intensive industries (Ratio of IT/ITES Sector revenue in GDP)
Percentage of households owning a computer
Price of retail broadband access as a % of average monthly salary
Access to computers (% of population using a computer)
Access to Internet Services (number of subscribers per 100 people)
Number of households owning a computer purchased under the Computer for All program
VTC facility is ready for occupancy
